SEARCH
Package env.agents

Class Archer

java.lang.Object
jason.asSemantics.Agent
env.agents.Agent
env.agents.Archer
All Implemented Interfaces:
jason.util.ToDOM, Serializable
public class Archer extends Agent
Represents an Archer agent in the game environment. Archers have specific attributes for health, attack range, attack power, and land probability.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Archer

      public Archer(String name, boolean team)
      Constructs a new Archer with the specified name and team. Sets the Archer's attributes to predefined values.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the archer.
      team - true if the archer belongs to team 1, false for team 2.
